content: Registering a new user does not seem to work. Page http://www.kanta.fi/en/web/ammattilaisille/tarkeaa-tietoa-kehittajille links to https://fhirsandbox2-auth.kanta.fi/phr-authserver-sandbox/registeruser which returns an error: Error 500: java.lang.IllegalStateException: No WebApplicationContext found: no ContextLoaderListener or DispatcherServlet registered?
I get the same error also when trying to reconfigure an existing client app at https://fhirsandbox2-auth.kanta.fi/phr-authserver-sandbox/register/63bccf80-8022-472a-a12e-6f48b1dd7e4d
Been wondering the same thing since the environment update.
We are investigating this problem and we'll inform you as soon as a solution is found.

Unfortunately one of the authentication servers was misconfigured. We corrected the problem and registering users is available again. Thank you for reporting the issue. My apologies for the inconvenience.
